ygData.subject: Re: Thank you Aarkon.
ygData.msgSnippet: One additional note from someone who just left the island (now level 16): If you get ganged up on (and it WILL happen) then let your pet take what he can and
ygData.messageBody:
One additional note from someone who just left the island (now level 16):

If you get ganged up on (and it WILL happen) then let your pet take what he can and
swim out into the water. I don't mean to waist level .... I mean swim out a bit. The
sisters can't/don't swim and will only follow you until the swim point. You can then
safely gate, or even summon a new pet. I've even memorized a pet spell, sent him up to
fight, then another until the coast was clear. =) Call it what you will but at least it
kept me from dying.

Some other tips would be to gamble a little and bind to Freeport. You will cut your
travel time to sell belts IMMENSELY. Yes if you die it will be a pain but it is sooooo
worth it to be able to gate back and sell things in a minute or two instead of about
30. Also, at level 12 several of the sisters will be in the blue range for you. Pay
attention to the clothing type since sisters of the same level range dress the same.

-Haytred

Heath Barker wrote:

> From: "Heath Barker" <Merxion@...>
>
> Actually like all places in EQ there is a risk Reward. stay away con and be
> smart. worst mistake you could make is to get greedy. What I usually do is
> watch for the island once it comes into sight is to swim to it. This puts
> me on a little outcropping that has a pretty good spawn rate of the lower
> level Sisters. Keep an eye out for them and dont be affraid of sacking your
> pet and gating.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jon Fiedler <fiedler@...>
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, August 02, 1999 7:03 AM
> Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Thank you Aarkon.
>
> >From: "Jon Fiedler" <fiedler@...>
> >
> >I have a couple questions about the island... I'm almost 12 (on a new
> >server) and was thinking about checking it out.
> >
> >I know there are some high level sisters (red to my old char at 17)... do
> >you have to worry about them wandering by? The one I know I saw was
> >standing out in the water a little ways from the island.
> >
> >Where is a good place to hunt on the island? I've never really been there
> >(seen it from the boat many times) and since I believe they will be agro to
> >my DE Necro (they are wood elves) I won't be able to really explore.
> >
> >Any other general advise/tips about the island?
> >
> >The darkness be with you,
> >Azerin now of Brell
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >> Aarkon,
> >> I read your post the other day about being able to
> >> handle Sister Isle from level 12+. Being level 12
> >> myself I decided to try it last night. I'm now
> >> level 13 and having a blast. Thank you.
> >>
> >> -Haytred
> >>
